description: Save time with ready-made falafels and have this sensational salad on the table in 20 minutes. The whole family will love this filling vegetarian dish.
name: Falafel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 wholemeal Lebanese bread rounds, roughly torn
0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked, 1/2 finely chopped
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
2 little gem lettuce combo, leaves separated

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place bread, in a single layer, on 1 tray. Spray with oil and sprinkle with sumac. Place falafel on remaining tray. Bake for 8 minutes or until falafel is heated through and bread is golden and crisp.

Meanwhile, reserve 1/2 cup parsley. Finely chop remainder. Combine yoghurt and half of the lemon juice in a small bowl. Place tomato, onion, chopped parsley, chopped mint, oil and remaining lemon juice in a medium bowl and toss to combine.
Arrange lettuce and cucumber in a large dish. Top with tomato salad, falafel and dressing. Scatter over mint and reserved parsley. Serve with bread.
